Your favorites, just a click away

Graze makes dining effortless with a streamlined ordering process. Explore our menu, select your favorites, and enjoy the same elegant cuisine you love in the comfort of your home. Whether it's delivery or pickup, we make it simple to savor every bite.

Catering

Tailored cuisine for unforgettable gatherings

Let us bring our signature elegance to your special events with curated catering options designed to impress.
Catering 
Reservations
Book your Graze reservation on Resy Skip Photo Gallery 
About us

Graze is where elegance meets a relaxed, casual dining experience. Our menu is inspired by the art of grazing, offering dishes that celebrate fresh, high-quality ingredients. Whether you're here for a quick bite or a special evening, we make every meal unforgettable.

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

Anthony T:
five star review by 
Great little spot with a very tasteful menu. Checks a lot of the boxes for a typical foodie. When I am back in town I will definitely return.

Review by - Google

Meia M:
five star review by 
Even as delivery, some of the tastiest and unique food in the area. Quality, fresh, worth the price. The sauces are obviously housemade and enhance each dish.

Review by - Google

Brad G:
five star review by 
Enjoyed eating at Graze while on vacation. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, and the food - lobster Mac n cheese, Citris chili short rib tacos - was delicious!

Review by - Google

Cecilia C:
five star review by 
Such a cute little place with AMAZING food!!!

Review by - Google

Ryan T:
five star review by 
I loved the meatloaf, and my wife (a picky eater) loved the pulled pork mac and cheese and the garlic tomato soup. We will have to make this one of our regular spots!

Newsletter

Location

863 Houston Northcutt Blvd

Mount Pleasant, SC

29464

Hours

Monday thru Saturday Lunch from 11:00-3:00

Monday thru Thursday Dinner from 5:00-9:00

Friday and Saturday Dinner from 5:00-9:30

Sundays Closed
